Interface ClientUI

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientController, LoginController, PayBillController, StaffController, TerminalController, TerminalEntryController
public interface ClientUI
Defines the callback interface for client-side UI components.

Implementing classes receive connection lifecycle events and messages coming from the server via BistroClient.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    handleServerMessage(Object msg)
    Handles a message received from the server.
    void
    onConnected()
    Called when the client successfully establishes a connection to the server.
    void
    onConnectionError(Exception e)
    Called when a connection-related error occurs.
    void
    onDisconnected()
    Called when the connection to the server is closed.

  • Method Details

    • onConnected

      void onConnected()
      Called when the client successfully establishes a connection to the server.

    • onDisconnected

      void onDisconnected()
      Called when the connection to the server is closed.

    • onConnectionError

      void onConnectionError(Exception e)
      Called when a connection-related error occurs.
      Parameters:
      e - the exception describing the connection error

    • handleServerMessage

      void handleServerMessage(Object msg)
      Handles a message received from the server.
      Parameters:
      msg - the raw message object sent by the server
